Key Match Events: LeBron James and Bronny James became the first father and son to play in the NBA together Tuesday night during the Los Angeles Lakers' 110-103 win over Minnesota
Post-Match Reflections: AD's 36-point double-double leads Lakers to opening-night win
Miscellaneous Highlights: LeBron and Bronny James make NBA history by playing together in Lakers' 110-103 win over Minnesota
Others: The game was played at crypto.com Arena with an attendance of 18,997.
The line was MIN -1.5 and the over/under was 223.5.
